article.title: Lockheed Awarded Space-Based Infrared Systems Funds
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Space Systems Co., Sunnyvale, Calif., is being awarded a $66,645,714 contract modification for initial non-recurring engineering for the Space-Based Infrared Systems GEO 5-6 program. The contracting activity is the Space and Missile Systems Center, Los Angeles Air Force Base, Calif.
